General.Name: Usha Resources Ltd
General.Description: Usha Resources Ltd., a mineral acquisition and exploration company, focuses on the development of battery and precious metal properties. Its portfolio of properties consist of Jackpot Lake, a lithium project in Nevada; White Willow, a lithium project in Ontario; and Lost Basin, a gold-copper project in Arizona. Usha Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1575 Kamloops Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V5K 3W1
